message: You’ve successfully registered for the {Title} webinar! We will see you on {date} at {time}.
Use the personalized Zoom link below to access the presentation on webinar day:
If you have questions or need assistance with your registration, please contact the Justia Connect Team.
Don’t forget to save the date!
note: Worried about missing your webinar? Justia Connect Pro members receive exclusive access to recordings of all Justia Webinars. Go Pro to get this benefit.
